I ordered this dress in size Large, and it fit perfectly true to size. For reference, I am 170 cm tall and wear size 5.5 shoes. The color is a timeless, classic shade, and the dress sits beautifully on the body. It feels elegant and sophisticated.  One minor detail: the bra straps are slightly visible, so I’d recommend either wearing a special bra or stitching the dress straps slightly to cover them. I paired the dress with stunning statement jewelry, and it elevated the whole look, making me feel absolutely gorgeous.  This dress is an excellent choice for women who prefer a bit of coverage while still looking chic and refined. Highly recommend!
